flavors.description: Double up on deliciousness with Caramel Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with toasted pecan pieces and novelty chocolate.
Premium blend of cocoas for the ultimate chocolate experience.
Culver's Classic! This one still knocks our socks off. Specially blended Butter Pecan Fresh Frozen Custard with toasted pecan pieces.
Our specially blended Strawberry Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with plump strawberries.
Our specially blended Peach Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with sweet peaches for a light, refreshing treat.
Dark Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with a ribbon of peanut butter and crunchy Butterfinger pieces.

Cheesecake flavored custard, blueberries and New York cheesecake pieces
Vanilla frozen custard, Snickers candy bar pieces, smooth caramel swirl
A light cheesecake flavored custard with just a hint of Amaretto and swirls of cherry pie filling.
Our malt-flavored custard with mini M&Ms and hot fudge.
